scripts.plop-test: rimraf ./src/routers/generated/bottoms && plop -- --typeName Bottom --tableName bottoms --endpoint bottoms --validationSchema ClothingItemValidationSchema
scripts.create-routes: plop -- --typeName Accessory --tableName accessories --endpoint accessories --validationSchema ClothingItemValidationSchema && plop -- --typeName Bottom --tableName bottoms --endpoint bottoms --validationSchema ClothingItemValidationSchema && plop -- --typeName Feet --tableName feet --endpoint feet --validationSchema ClothingItemValidationSchema && plop -- --typeName Head --tableName heads --endpoint heads --validationSchema ClothingItemValidationSchema && plop -- --typeName Outfit --tableName outfits --endpoint outfits --validationSchema EntityValidationSchema && plop -- --typeName Top --tableName tops --endpoint tops --validationSchema ClothingItemValidationSchema && plop -- --typeName Wrist --tableName wrists --endpoint wrists --validationSchema ClothingItemValidationSchema
scripts.generate-types-from-openapi-json: rimraf docs/openapi/client && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i docs/openapi/OverfitterAPI.json -o docs/openapi/client

hooks.pre-commit: npm run prettier-format && npm run lint
